features: Quality Packaging: each package contains 11 pieces of playroom signs in black color, each individually crafted with excellence; This complete set included theme words [Where], [The], [Wild], [Ones]and [Play] transforms many rooms into a modern, that caters to your child's imagination

Ideal Home Decoration Size: this where the wild ones play nursery sign is designed to fill a substantial space on your wall, thus being noticeable; It carries fun quotes to lend a sense of enjoyment and mirth to your child's room; Sized as shown in the pictures, it can enhance the overall appearance of your child's living area

Children's Themed Design: the play sign for playroom wall comes with the heart warming quote [Where the Wild Things Play] intended to inspire creativity and fun in any child's play area, whether it be a playroom, bedroom, or living room; As its lightweight design, which allows for easy rearrangement and safe hanging on the wall

Quality Material and Construction: the playroom wall decor is crafted from sturdy and reliable wood, ensuring its longevity; It's safe, and not easy to fade, providing a long lasting adornment for your child's playroom or bedroom; Should it become dirty, a simple wipe with a damp cloth will restore its cleanliness

Versatile and Thoughtful Gift: this baby room wall decorations are not just for adorning your child's playroom or bedroom; They can also beautify walls in kindergartens and nurseries; For those in your life who value aesthetic home accents, this wall decor makes an excellent and thoughtful gift
body.description: Features: Lightweight and convenient Installation: Despite its substantial size, this kids room decor is lightweight, which allows for easy rearrangement and safe hanging on the wall. No need to worry about damaging your walls, as every piece is meticulously carved and carefully made. Attractive black color: To match your room aesthetic, the toddler boy bedroom decor is finished in black color. This choice of color not only adds a stylish touch but also creates a warm, inviting atmosphere in your kids's room. Specifications: Material: wood Color: blackSize: as pictures shown Package includes: 11 x Playroom wall decorsNotes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size way smaller than picture
reviews.reviewText: Very very small sized compared to pictures advertised. Waste of time sent back same day. Company should take original photos with proper scale so people can actually see the size of the product. Now I’ve wasted yours and my time but I’m sending it back so really your money is being wasted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how these look in my playroom! Easy to hang and decent quality for the price! I’m very satisfied with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you look at the size before you order, very lightweight, easy to hang
reviews.reviewText: Make sure that you look at the details of this product to ensure that these will be big enough for what you want for the room that you will be using these in.The letters are very lightweight and not of excellent quality but they do look decent on the wall. We used double sided tape which worked fine because the letters are very lightweight. The black color was uneven in a couple of spots but not extremely noticeable.
